_comment_description: Students complete missing information in a table format based on the listening.
_comment_use_case: Listening Section 2/4, organized information, schedules, comparisons
prompt: Complete the table below. Write NO MORE THAN TWO WORDS AND/OR A NUMBER for each answer.

_field_descriptions.prompt: Instructions for completing the table with word/number limit
_field_descriptions.answer_key: Array of answers for each table cell in order (left to right, top to bottom)
_field_descriptions.table_data: Optional structure showing table headers and layout

_validation_rules.answer_key: Array of strings/numbers matching table cells in order
_validation_rules.table_data: Optional but helpful for complex tables

_grading.accepts_abbreviations: Common abbreviations accepted (Dr., Prof., Mon., etc.)
_grading.array_order: Answers must match table order (row by row, left to right)
